description: A baseball magazine that focuses on batting tips.  There are lots of colorful, full-page photos of skilled athletes demonstrating proper form and technique.

name.str: Bludgeons and Broken Bones: A Reference Guide
name.str_pl: copies of Bludgeons and Broken Bones: A Reference Guide

variants.description: Written with hard prison slang, this book says a lot about how to use maximum power from your muscles and weight of your weapon.

name.str: Bash Weapons for Self-Defense: A Practical Guide
name.str_pl: copies of Bash Weapons for Self-Defense: A Practical Guide

variants.description: A small brochure from an unknown self-defense shop, focused on using bash weapons for self-defense in real-world situations.  It covers topics like assessing threats, using verbal commands and body language to de-escalate situations, and legal considerations for using force in self-defense.  It also includes techniques for using bash weapons to defend against attackers armed with knives, guns, and other weapons.

name.str: Ultra Tactics: The Ways of the Modern Warrior
name.str_pl: copies of Ultra Tactics: the Ways of the Modern Warrior

variants.description: This book researches the long, international story of ultras - fanatical football fans ready to defend the prestige of their football team in any possible way, including with brutal violence and heavy bats.

name.str_pl: copies of tactical baton defense manual

description: An informative guide to self-defense using clubs and batons.  Aimed at the law enforcement and military market, it is packed with time tested, no-nonsense information and written to be understandable for beginners.

name.str: The Art and Science of Stick Fighting
name.str_pl: copies of The Art and Science of Stick Fighting

variants.description: A non-style specific guide to fighting with the short stick, with a few levels of instructions from easy to master, and a lot of photos showing movements with motion arrows.

A comprehensive guide on how to do demolition on your own piece of land - from replacing the pavement to total house deconstruction - using only common instruments.  Surprisingly not so hard, as you just need to know how and when hit the thing.
"The Authoritative Guide to Using the Cane or Walking Stick for Self-Defense", this book provides plenty of ways to use an everyday tool as a sturdy weapon.
